Definition at line 60 of file MysqlConnector.cpp.

int32_t mt::MysqlConnector::init ( bool  useDatabase = true  ) 

Initialize database connection.

Parameters:
if useDatabase = true - MysqlConnector will use <DbName> database as default. if useDatabase = false, no default database will be setted. You should exec "Use database <dbname>" query at first.
Returns:
0 if success and -1 if error occured.
